DESCRIPTION

Drug: Oxymorphone | cid: 5284604
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about Oxymorphone (Opana) including uses, images, dosage, effects, legal status, and links to other resources.
Erowid name: oxymorphone
Category: PHARMS
Field: MainPage

                    Text: 
                    COMMON & BRAND NAMES

Numorphan (injectable solution); Opana (tablet)

EFFECTS CLASSIFICATION

Opioid Analgesic

CHEMICAL NAME

4,5-epoxy-3,14-dihydroxy-17-methylmorphinan-6-one

DESCRIPTION

Oxymorphone, a semisynthetic opioid analgesic 10 times more potent than morphine, is used in the treatment of moderate to severe pain. It is sometimes used as an adjunct to anesthesia.

EFFECTS

IMAGES

MEDIA COVERAGE #
